original_text: Realize the truth! I alone am God. There is no other god as well as me. I can kill and I can give life. I can hurt people and I can make them well again. Nobody can stop me doing what I choose to do. Realize the truth! I alone am God. There is no other god as well as me. I can kill and I can give life. I can hurt people and I can make them well again. Nobody can stop me doing what I choose to do. Realize the truth! I alone am God. There is no other god as well as me. I can kill and I can give life. I can hurt people and I can make them well again. Nobody can stop me doing what I choose to do. Realize the truth! I alone am God. There is no other god as well as me. I can kill and I can give life. I can hurt people and I can make them well again. Nobody can stop me doing what I choose to do. Realize the truth! I alone am God.
korean_text: 이제는 나 곧 내가 그인 줄 알라 나 외에는 신이 없도다 나는 죽이기도 하며 살리기도 하며 상하게도 하며 낫게도 하나니 내 손에서 능히 빼앗을 자가 없도다

sentences.original_text: There is no other god as well as me.

sentences.korean_translation: 내가 사람을 다치게 할 수 있고

sentences.original_text: and I can make them well again.
doing what I choose to do.
